item.title: 2018 DoE Annual Scholarship
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, Central Tibetan Administration is pleased to announce 530 scholarships for the year 2018. All interested students must submit your scholarship application online along with form A and other necessary documents on or before June 15, 2018 (Bachelors) & August 31, 2018 (Masters), except an application of Special Scholarship for Master in...

item.title: 2017 Sikyong Professional Sholarship Announcement
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA & the Tibet Fund are pleased to announce 8 Bachelor’s degree and 12 Post Graduate (Master’s Program) professional course/program. This scholarship is offered to encourage Tibetan students to apply to more competitive professional degree programs at selective professional schools in India.

item.title: INTERNSHIP OPPORTUNITY FOR COLLEGE GRADUATES AT NATIONAL INSTITUTES
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA is pleased to announce that the National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS), Bangalore and Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER), Pune has kindly agreed to provide one month internship for Tibetan Science graduates from June15 to July15, 2015. This is a rare opportunity for the graduates to gain...

item.title: TPI Inviting Applications for Visiting Research Fellows
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Tibet Policy Institute of the Central Tibetan Administration invite applications for the posts of visiting research fellows preferably with a background on the issues related to Tibet and China. Aspiring candidates can send in their applications along with necessary documents according to the criteria mentioned against each category by 20th May 2015.
